SEARCH
Package parade.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
parade.players.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Abstract base class representing a player in the Parade game.

This class defines the shared functionality and attributes for both HumanPlayer and BotPlayer classes. It includes hand management, card collection, turn logic, and endgame condition checking.
